A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't want to flesh this review out as I will be required to feel. And i feel sad this script got green lit. I'll do my best to ignore this in the grand Skywalker saga and perhaps fill in the black hole with my own imaginings over time. However great a movie looks and sounds in the moment\, it needs good context to ground it. TLJ holds no long lasting passion i associate with most star wars storytelling. Milking the cow might not be so easy if Disney keeps this up.
